judges: BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendant’s motion for release pending appeal is denied.
BEVILACQUA, C. J., did not participate.

attorneys: Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Judith Crowell, Stephen Lichatih III, Special Asst. Attys. Gen., for plaintiff.
Angelo A. Mosca, Jr., William A. Gosz, Providence, for defendant.
casebody.head_matter:
STATE v. Stephen R. GIOIELLI.
No. 78-414-C.A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
May 22, 1980.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Judith Crowell, Stephen Lichatih III, Special Asst. Attys. Gen., for plaintiff.
Angelo A. Mosca, Jr., William A. Gosz, Providence, for defendant.
